ygData.msgSnippet: *Kit holds a hand to her mouth to hide a smile at the name, but then lets it away, letting her smile turn into one of the friendly sort* That s a nice name,

*Kit holds a hand to her mouth to hide a smile at the name, but then lets it away, letting her smile turn into one of the friendly sort*

"That's a nice name, Pegasus" *At the faction, she looks mildly dissapointed* "Oh, a Maximal.. I'm on neither side. I'm afraid you'll have to serve under that buffoon.. Liono Prime"

*She shakes her head slightly at the mere mention of the name*

"By the way, I'm Kit, I'm fairly new to this world as well, but I know quite a lot before I've even met him.. or the rest of the Maximals. Most of them are real great.. good in battle as well" *She remembers from the battle at the Ark*

"I take it you'd want to get to the Ark.. or the Maximal base?"

------Original Message------
From: "Joseph Frey" <jfrey1@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: May 16, 2000 8:05:55 PM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


"My name?"  He paused as his identity circuits came online.

"Yes, I remember now.  My name's Pegasus.  Maximal Exploration Force."
